channel.title: Adding a shop

item.title: Adding a shop
item.dc:creator: @Skiddle Skiddle
item.description:
@Skiddle wrote:

Well, might as well not waste the topic lol, i’m gonna recycle it.

I need to remove a command, ::addxp,(I know how to remove it -.-) and add something like…::master. But look at how one of these commands are.

else if(command.startsWith("addxp")) { String[] s = command.split(" "); p.addSkillXP(Integer.parseInt(s[2]), Integer.parseInt(s[1])); }

I want to add a ::master command that you can only add once but the files for this server are way differnt then the files for other ones so they arn’t the same and I have no idea how to create a 1-time ::master

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a shop
item.dc:creator: @Skiddle Skiddle
item.description:
@Skiddle wrote:

I’m working on rs2e, and I want to add a shop… But it doesn’t have client.java, and alot of the files. This isn’t cause I need to add them but what file would I be looking in to add shops. = fixed, gonna post another problem.

Well, might as well not waste the topic lol, i’m gonna recycle it.

I need to remove a command, ::addxp, and add something like…::master. But look at how one of these commands are.

else if(command.startsWith("addxp")) { String[] s = command.split(" "); p.addSkillXP(Integer.parseInt(s[2]), Integer.parseInt(s[1])); }

I want to add a ::master command that you can only add once but the files for this server are way differnt then the files for other ones so they arn’t the same and I have no idea how to create a 1-time ::master
